title: Tax Properties for the V2 DOGOWN Token
body:
**This proposal is to determine the V2 DOGOWN token tax properties ONLY!**

Soon we will be swapping the V1 DOGOWN tokens to the new and improved V2 DOGOWN tokens however, we need to all agree as a community on the best tax properties for the project. We have compiled a list of choices below, please select one option and cast your vote.

The V2 DOGOWN tokenomics will remain the same and 50% will be burned as per our V1 DOGOWN token launch.

Once voting ends we will then take those tax properties and launch the new smart contract in anticipation of the swap.

Each proposal listed below will maintain a 10% per buy+sell tx but split in the following way.

**The V2 token we are proposing to launch will have:**
**RFI/STAKING** - Meaning you HODL tokens and you will receive more tokens through every buy and sell transaction that happens on the market.

**BURN MECHANISM** - Meaning a percentage of the transaction will be burned to a dead wallet creating a deflationary supply.

**AUTO LP** - Meaning each trade that happens Liquidity will automatically be added into the Liquidity Pool which increases the floor price of the token and ensures there is always more liquidity getting added to the pool even when early supporters may exit their positions fully.

**CHARITY/MARKETING/DEV** - The project will not succeed if there are no funds to maintain marketing and development works, and we want to add a charity aspect to support dog shelters and animal rescue.

**OPTIONS: 10% per buy+sell tx but split in the following way.**

**OPTION #1** - 5% Auto LP, 3% RFI, 1% Burn, 1% Charity/Marketing/Dev = 10% total

**OPTION #2** - 4% Auto LP, 3% RFI, 2% Burn, 1% Charity/Marketing/Dev = 10% total

**OPTION #3** - 6% Auto LP, 2% RFI, 1% Burn, 1% Charity/Marketing/Dev = 10% total

**OPTION #4** - 3% Auto LP, 3% RFI, 3% Burn, 1% Charity/Marketing/Dev = 10% total

**IMPORTANT NOTES:**
-To vote ensure you are connected to the Binance Smart Chain and follow these instructions - https://docs.snapshot.org/proposals/vote
-There are no fees or Gas required to cast your vote.
author: 0x01ee3badd52DC1C68190CE250036c243aad422b7
